hero.title: Arab Alliance for Seed Production
hero.description: We work to develop agricultural production with the highest international standards and advanced seed production technologies to support sustainable food security.

sectors.title: Business Sectors
sectors.subtitle: What We Offer
sectors.potatoDesc: Production and distribution of the best international varieties with highest productivity and disease resistance.
sectors.fertilizersDesc: Integrated plant nutrition solutions designed specifically for different soil types.
sectors.irrigationDesc: Modern and smart irrigation technologies to rationalize water consumption and increase efficiency.
sectors.pesticidesDesc: Effective crop protection using the latest environmentally safe pesticides.
sectors.improvedSeedsDesc: Development of local strains to ensure self-sufficiency in high-quality seeds.
sectors.consultingDesc: Specialized technical expertise and field support team to ensure farmers' success.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.quality: Quality: Commitment to the highest standards of agricultural production.
values.sustainability: Sustainability: Supporting farmers to ensure a better future.
values.reliability: Reliability: Leadership in the Arab regional market.

founding.title: Company Establishment and Identity
founding.description1: Arab Alliance for Seed Production (Egyptian Joint Stock Company) was established on January 10, 2024 in accordance with Law No. 159 of 1981 and its executive regulations. Our journey began with an ambitious vision to bridge the gap in high-quality seed production.
founding.description2: On October 29, 2025, the company name was amended to 'Arab Alliance for Seed Production' to reflect our new expansionary vision and ambition to lead the agricultural sector across the Arab region.

purpose.title: Company Purpose
purpose.item1: Production of all types of agricultural seeds from vegetables and fruits, especially potato seeds
purpose.item2: Screening, sorting and storage of agricultural crop seeds in designated refrigerators
purpose.item3: Trading in fertilizers, nutrients, agricultural chemicals, raw materials and pesticides
purpose.item4: Marketing and selling crops, seeds and agricultural products
purpose.item5: Establishing and operating factories for manufacturing, packaging solid and liquid fertilizers

legal.title: Legal Status and Accreditation
legal.description: The company operates in accordance with Law No. 159 of 1981 and its executive regulations as an Egyptian joint stock company, committed to the highest standards of governance and legal transparency. It was registered in the commercial register under number 223869 on 10/1/2024.

capital.title: Capital Evolution
capital.subtitle: Overview of the company's financial value growth from establishment to 2025

info.title: Company Capital
info.shares: Distributed over 612,500,000 shares with nominal value of 1 EGP per share

hero.title: Shareholder Structure and Official Board of Directors
hero.description: Corporate data and governance of Arab Alliance for Seed Production. We are committed to the highest standards of transparency in managing our agricultural investments.

governance.title: Governance Charter
governance.description: Board members are selected according to competency standards and extensive experience in the agricultural and investment sector. The Board is committed to holding regular meetings to ensure operations align with sustainable Arab food security goals.

hero.title: Investor Relations
hero.description: Financial data, governance reports and transparency

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.description: We are here to answer your inquiries and help you with everything related to our products and agricultural solutions.

hero.title: Our Products and Areas of
hero.description: We provide integrated agricultural solutions with the highest international quality standards to enhance food security and develop the agricultural sector in the Arab region.

potato.title: Potato Seeds
potato.description: We specialize in producing, importing and exporting the best internationally certified potato seed varieties. Our focus is on providing high-yielding, disease-resistant strains to ensure the best return for farmers.
potato.feature3: Storage in modern refrigerators to ensure vitality

items.seedsDesc: Providing a wide range of vegetable and field crop seeds with the highest germination rates.
items.fertilizersDesc: Integrated fertilization solutions including compound, mineral fertilizers and bio-fertilizers.
items.cropsDesc: Storage and export of fresh agricultural crops according to international specifications.
items.irrigationDesc: Supply of all spare parts, solutions and network supplies for water conservation.
items.livestockDesc: Providing feed, nutritional additives and farm supplies to increase production.
items.consultingDesc: Providing technical support and specialized consultations for farmers and investors.

cta.title: Looking for a Strategic Partner for Your Project?
cta.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you choose the best products and solutions that suit your needs and ensure the success of your agricultural season.

hero.title: Projects
hero.description: Our strategic projects to enhance food security

irrigation.title: Smart Irrigation Systems Development
irrigation.desc: Using artificial intelligence to rationalize water and increase irrigation efficiency.

desert.title: Desert Land Reclamation Project
desert.desc: Transforming the desert into productive green land using the latest technologies.

greenhouse.title: Modern Greenhouse Project
greenhouse.desc: Increasing productivity through protected and controlled agriculture.

vertical.title: Vertical Farming Project
vertical.desc: Innovative agricultural solutions for densely populated urban areas.

seedProduction.title: Improved Seed Production Complex
seedProduction.desc: Production of high-quality local strains for Arab farmers.

drone.title: Drone Monitoring Project
drone.desc: Crop monitoring and data analysis using drones.

footer.description: A leading company in the production, import and export of agricultural seeds, striving to achieve Arab food security through innovative agricultural solutions.
